feed.title: GitHub Emacs Lisp Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Emacs Lisp in GitHub

entry.title: inlinechan/gdb-ui
entry.summary:
gdb-ui.el from emacs23.3b

This is to enable gdb-ui with --annotate=3 rather than -i=mi.

entry.title: don9z/emacs-kit
entry.summary:
Yet another starter kit for Emacs

Emacs-Kit

Emacs is the best text editor, but it takes time to configure it.

This kit aims to make it easy, with efficient and readable scripts.

It depends on some packages, but in case that some functions might not be needed, most of the packages are lazy loaded.

Also, Emacs packaging mechanism is adopted in this kit, all packages are downloaded and installed from MELPA during the first launch of Emacs.

There are still some packages missing in MELPA are stored in the extensions folder, some are fetched from github, hope it will be removed soon.

Please run git submodule init and git submodule update after you've cloned it.

Please use Emacs 24+, and load init.el in your .emacs file.
